name: Potato Knight
description:
You are a knight trying to get potatos for your meal.

You have limited time to do so

Good Luck.

Click To Try Again

Arrows To Move

Go Against A Wall, Turn Around And Jump To Wall Jump

Credits: Font By Chequered Ink, Knight By 0x72

Game Made By xqrzguy for the Trijam #175 In 3 Hours
